prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Synth Lead, Piano, Bass, Guitar, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Piano, Bass, Guitar, and a Synth Lead, but no Organ.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Synth Lead, Piano, Bass, and Guitar, but no Organ.

Style 3:
This song has Drums, Piano, Bass, Guitar, and a Synth Lead, Organ excluded.
